text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One morning, while on a stroll along<n>the river, I notice a
certain runner out<n>of the corner of my eye.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Ah, good morning!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you bet! How could I not be<n>when it's so nice
outside?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I feel like I could do laps forever in<n>this weather. Anyway,
I'll let you get<n>back to your walk! See ya!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Our short exchange now over, Mejiro<n>Ryan takes off. Her
jog seems to be<n>more for fun than sport, but her form<n>is
still consistent. It's honestly<n>impressive.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But that thought is quickly replaced by<n>another, more
immediate concern...<n>Shouldn't she be headed to school?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Ah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Right, right. I wanted to try out that<n>new running routine!
Better do one...<n>no, five more laps!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Ah, it's you again... What's<n>up?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Late? For wha—aaah! School! I<n>gotta go, and quick!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Aw man, thanks for the heads-up! It<n>was so nice this
morning, I totally<n>zoned out!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Anyway, gotta run! Thanks again!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Ryan dashes off towards the<n>school, once again
displaying her<n>flawless running form.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: That same day, after classes...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh? You're the person from this<n>morning!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Wait, that badge... Ah, that's how you<n>knew I was running
late! You're a<n>trainer here, huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Thanks again for the save! And don't<n>worry, I made it to
school in time!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I'd like to pay you back somehow,<n>but how... Ah, I know!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Um, could you come with me for a<n>second?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
All right, we're finally here! As thanks<n>for helping me this
morning...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: We're gonna work out together!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
You bet! As far as thanks go, this is<n>probably the best I've
got!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I've always loved moving my body,<n>you see. In fact,
exercise might be the<n>only thing I'm good at.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
But hey, that just makes me the best<n>kind of coach—the
kind that shows you<n>how fun workouts can be! I'll even<n>
come up with the perfect routine for<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ah... Suddenly being asked to work<n>out must be kinda
strange, right?<n>Sorry, I can come up with something<n>else if
you like...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My hesitation clearly has Mejiro<n>Ryan feeling down. I
decide to step up.
choice_data_list: Well, this is certainly a rare opportunity...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Seriously?! Awesome! In that case,<n>let's get changed and
pump some<n>iron!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Phew! How's that, Trainer?! Feelin'<n>the burn yet?!
choice_data_list: Oh yeah... I'm feeling it, all right...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Hey, don't sweat it if you're having<n>trouble keeping up!
We've just been<n>waking up your muscles!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: All right, time for the realworkout! Well hydrated?! Great! Let'sget SWOLE!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
That's it! One more rep! One more!<n>Hm? Can't keep going?
Okay, just<n>one more to finish out the set and...<n>Yeah! You
did it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Great job! Do you feel that, Trainer? I<n>bet your heart, your
pectorals—your<n>whole body's screaming out in<n>gratitude!
choice_data_list: Y-yeah... You're right! I can hear them!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Perfect! Then let's scream back and<n>show your body what
it's made of! On<n>to the second round!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Okay, Trainer... This is it! The final<n>stretch! Come on! Count
out the reps<n>with me!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: One!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Threeee! Woohoo! You did it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Exhaustion consumes me... but it's<n>accompanied by a
strong feeling of<n>accomplishment and pride! After all,<n>that
was one intense workout!
choice_data_list: Do you do this every day?
Do you do this every day?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Nah, today's workout was made with<n>you in mind. I'd say I
usually do...<n>about four times more in total.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
But any exercise is good exercise as<n>far as your muscles
are concerned!<n>Keep it up, and you'll see results in<n>no
time!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Nothing beats seeing your time go<n>down, even by a single
second. And<n>when your hard work shows on the<n>track...
Man, that's something entirely<n>different!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
That moment when you're the<n>fastest on the track... when
you cross<n>that finish line before anyone else...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Feeling your muscles burn and that<n>heat spread throughout
your body... No<n>better experience than that.
choice_data_list: Is that why you run? To feel that?
Is that why you run? To feel that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: You bet!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Hope that's not... too disappointing.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ryan's reaction to my question is a<n>bit perplexing, but
before I can<n>continue, another Umamusume<n>approaches
her.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Ryan! Where are yo—ah, there you<n>are! Figures you'd be in
the gym!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Oh, Ines! What's up?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
The tryouts are coming up,<n>remember? I figured you'd be<n>
training for that, so let's run together!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, really?! That'd be amazing!<n>Wanna get started right
now?!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: I knew you'd say yes! ♪ I'll go get<n>changed!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Guess I better get going too. Great<n>work today—I mean it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: See ya 'round!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Judging from that conversation,<n>Mejiro Ryan's running in
the tryouts...<n>Which means I'll be able to see how<n>she
runs at her best.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With something to look forward to, I<n>pack up and leave the
gym with a<n>spring in my step. Or... I would if I<n>wasn't so
sore.
